extendedInfo.description: FREE Revolver App!Load the chamber, spin the cylinder and pull the trigger to fire!***If you like weapons, guns, handguns, revolvers, pistols, shotguns and other firearms, this app is what you need! Try it!***You can use this handgun app to play russian roulette with your friends.Classic rules of russian roulet:1. Load the chamber with one bullet2. Spin the cylinder3. Put the gun to your head4. Fire!***You can use your phone's volume buttons to control the gun!***You can load into the pistol as many bullets as you want!***You can prank your friends with pretty realistic shot sounds!***I hope you like my app, and I want to keep it free for you.In order to do that, there is ad banner in my app.And there is Ad-Free version of my app for only $0.99!If you don't want to see ads in this app you can buy pro version.Permissions "INTERNET" and "NETWORK ACCESS" are needed only to display advertisement!***Thanks for your support, friends!Thanks for your reviews!

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: Of all the others this revolver app is the best. with the volume at full blast the shots sound almost deafening. This app also allows to place individual bullets in individual chambers. I also like that u can use the volume as the trigger. Just two things I would suggest changing. I would like both both volume buttons to be the trigger. It doesnt make sense to pull the trigger to spin the cylinder. The second thing is more of a fix up than a change. Make the.cylinder spin more realistic.
reviews.author: Zachary Scherry

reviews.title: Awsome!
reviews.comment: The gun is relustic, and it has an interesting concept with great potential! The sounds can be improved as well as the position of the bullets as it is not in the holes position.
reviews.author: Jordan Lim
